ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor

Class PhotoEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor.PhotoEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BrushViewChangeListener

    public class PhotoEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements BrushViewChangeListener

    This class in initialize by PhotoEditor.Builder using a builder pattern with multiple editing attributes

    Since:
    18/01/2017

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PhotoEditor.Builder
      Builder pattern to define PhotoEditor Instance
      static interface  PhotoEditor.OnSaveListener
      A callback to save the edited image asynchronously

      • addImage

        public void addImage(android.graphics.Bitmap desiredImage)
        This will add image on PhotoEditorView which you drag,rotate and scale using pinch if PhotoEditor.Builder.setPinchTextScalable(boolean) enabled
        Parameters:
        desiredImage - bitmap image you want to add

      • addText

        public void addText(java.lang.String text,
                    int colorCodeTextView)
        This add the text on the PhotoEditorView with provided parameters by default TextView.setText(int) will be 18sp
        Parameters:
        text - text to display
        colorCodeTextView - text color to be displayed

      • addText

        public void addText(@Nullable
                    android.graphics.Typeface textTypeface,
                    java.lang.String text,
                    int colorCodeTextView)
        This add the text on the PhotoEditorView with provided parameters by default TextView.setText(int) will be 18sp
        Parameters:
        textTypeface - typeface for custom font in the text
        text - text to display
        colorCodeTextView - text color to be displayed

                     java.lang.String inputText,
                     int colorCode)
        This will update text and color on provided view
        Parameters:
        view - view on which you want update
        inputText - text to update TextView
        colorCode - color to update on TextView

      • editText

        public void editText(android.view.View view,
                     android.graphics.Typeface textTypeface,
                     java.lang.String inputText,
                     int colorCode)
        This will update the text and color on provided view
        Parameters:
        view - root view where text view is a child
        textTypeface - update typeface for custom font in the text
        inputText - text to update TextView
        colorCode - color to update on TextView

      • addEmoji

        public void addEmoji(java.lang.String emojiName)
        Adds emoji to the PhotoEditorView which you drag,rotate and scale using pinch if PhotoEditor.Builder.setPinchTextScalable(boolean) enabled
        Parameters:
        emojiName - unicode in form of string to display emoji

      • addEmoji

        public void addEmoji(android.graphics.Typeface emojiTypeface,
                     java.lang.String emojiName)
        Adds emoji to the PhotoEditorView which you drag,rotate and scale using pinch if PhotoEditor.Builder.setPinchTextScalable(boolean) enabled
        Parameters:
        emojiTypeface - typeface for custom font to show emoji unicode in specific font
        emojiName - unicode in form of string to display emoji
